summary: This just deletes all the textures in Skyrim if you're curious what Skyrim would look like without them
descriptionHtml:
This just deletes all the textures in Skyrim if you're curious what Skyrim would look like without them

WARNING! WARNING! WARNING!

Make a backup of Skyrim - Textures.bsa before installing it. If you don't, you will be stuck with no textures in your Skyrim.


How I 'made' the mod:

I downloaded a nodders resource with no scripts and renamed the .bsa file to Skyrim - Textures.bsa.

Uninstall:
Delete my Skyrim - Textures.bsa and replace it with the original one that came with your Skyrim that you should have made a backup of.

QandA:

Q: Help! I'm stuck with no textures in Skyrim!
A: If you did not make a backup of Skyrim - Textures.bsa, you will have to reinstall.

Credits:
Vicn - For having a .bsa file in one of his mods that has no scripts.
author: Gendundrup and Vicn
